channel.title: Can some one get me a 'howto' for moparscape linux
channel.description: OK id like a HOWTO for moparscape 3.2 on a linux PC. Please also include things which would happen to the PC. PS the link in the post of Moparisthebest didtn work... SO please send one which does with the HOWTO

item.title: Can some one get me a 'howto' for moparscape linux
item.dc:creator: @MazterSeven MazterSeven
item.description:
@MazterSeven wrote:

Well, search on Moparscape download… Go to the official page of moparscape…

Click at the link

Show the official thread how to run moparscape for Linux

Or download Moparscape, then click at the moparscape folder, then readme, it will say how to run it on linux.

//Masterseven

REP :d kidding

Read full topic
item.source: Can some one get me a 'howto' for moparscape linux
